name: Temi D Snr 😜
greetingText: Your swag na atomic bomb 💣! Abeg, no come scatter my CPU again o!
wishText: My codes just dey run bug-free today - na your birthday juju dey work! ✨🔥
text1: Oya oya! Queen's Day don show for Abj! 🎉🇳🇬
textInChatBox: Happy B'day Drayzilla! 🦖 As e hot, na so e sweet! Jollof don done? 🍛
sendButtonLabel: The Damilolas dey send love via Uber Black! 🚗💨 No go dey wobble o! 😂
text2: I bin wan send 'HBd' message do quick-quick
text3: But my spirit say 'Dray no be beans!' 🎂
text4: I con code small something wey
text4Adjective: dey pepper them like suya pepper! 🌶️😂
text5Content: You be Original Elegant Queen! 👑 Dammy Snr's Oga Madam!
wishHeading: Happy Born Day Mummy Dray! We dey yarn your praise for balcony! 📣🇳🇬
outroText: If this no sweet you, call Uber make I resend package! 📦😁
replayText: P.S: Your bro Dami dey flex like say na him birthday! 😂👌
outroSmiley: Custom sef wan later block the Uber package ooo 🥴🚔
